amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds for the National Nuclear Security Administration, Weapons Activities account (specifically the Long Range Standoff Cruise Missile Warhead Study) by $7.6 million and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for the National Nuclear Security Administration, Weapons Activities account (specifically the Long Range Standoff Cruise Missile Warhead Study) by $7.6 million and apply the savingsto the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Quigley amendment (A034) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 239 (Roll no. 384).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Quigley amendment (A034) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 239 (Roll no. 384).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A034) offered by Mr. Quigley.
